answers.answer: At least you heard the heartbeat so u know your baby is ok, and I hope everything is ok with u, please keep us updated

If u stress to you doctor how concerned u are and let them know u really think an ultra sound is necessary they will most likely do an ultrasound and make sure they know about the stomach pain. Good luck I hope everything is ok

question: I posted a question yesterday about low movement from baby and when to be concerned. Well called ob office and they told me to drink a soda and have a candy bar. Lay on my side and I should count 10 kicks in 2 hours. Well I didnt feel anything so I ended up going to labor and delivery triage.  Babys heart beat was good. My blood pressure was really high.  So they took some blood tested urine and possibly think I am on the verge of preeclampsia.  Well I have a terrible cold that came out of nowhere.  And I'm still not feeling baby like normal. Thankfully I see my ob tomorrow for my glucose test.  I'm just so worried.  He has slowed down for sure. I hope they do an ultrasound bc I am worried something isnt right. I've been really bloated with pains in my stomache. I need to not stress but its hard. I also got put on a weight restriction when he comes to lifting bc of my job. So now I cant work at the moment. ..
title: still worried. ..
